name: Jason Shapiro From Crowded Market Report
title: Chart Of The Week Currencies
text:
Synopsis
Speculators are heavily positioned for continued US Dollar strength, with significant short positions in commodity currencies (Australian, Canadian, and New Zealand Dollars), presenting a potential contrarian trading opportunity.

Key Insights
- Traders are making a substantial bet on continued US Dollar strength through early 2025
- Commodity currencies (AUD, CAD, NZD) show the most extreme speculator positioning
- The Crowded Market Report strategy involves waiting for market confirmation after identifying crowded trade positions
- The recommended approach is to trade against speculator sentiment and align with commercial traders when market signals indicate a potential reversal
